name: securityrequirementsanalysis_lab1-root
description: Root workspace for running frontend + backend concurrently.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.check-node: node -e "const v = process.versions.node.split('.').map(Number); if (v[0] < 20 || (v[0] === 20 && v[1] < 19)) { console.error('Node 20.19+ required'); process.exit(1); }"
